messages.message:
Hi Team, I am not sure whether this has been raised by anyone earlier or not. I was trying AiHub for the first time and I randomly uploaded one of the screenshots I have and given few prompts as well.
It seems the model would not pickup the previous Prompt given. I mean first I asked whether we have Investor name and as a follow up I asked the value for that field without mentioning the field name. Is this the expected behaviour?
History isn't supported rn. This is expected. Every query is expected to be a standalone question
ohh ok, are we working on this to support historyâ€™s as well? because I remember while I was using ChatGPT It answered my previous prompts without mentioning directly
yes @Sujith!! Chat history is in the plan for Q2 roadmap
